name: Powe Capital Management
overview:
Powe Capital Management (PCM) LLP is a fund management company, established in 2002 to manage assets on behalf of non-private investors. Having gained regulatory approval on 28th February 2002 from the FSA, PCM currently manages the PCM Europe Fund (launched 1st July 2009) and Tensor Europe Fund (launched 17th October 2005). PCM is a signatory to the Hedge Fund Standards Board.

PCM was founded by Rory Powe who wanted to create an independent company dedicated to the business of portfolio management. The skills of the 5-member team that makes up PCM have been bound together so that PCM can offer its clients both a clearly defined investment process and a robust infrastructure.
